short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Compare the diffs of 2 GitHub pull requests or Gitlab merge requests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily compare diffs between two GitHub Pull Requests or GitLab Merge Requests with PR Diff Compare. Simply open the extension on a PR tab, paste the URL of another PR, and get instant diff comparisons.

Key Features:
• Comparing diffs from GitHub and GitLab repositories
• Option to ignore code context for more precise comparisons
• Option to select specific files to compare
• No authentication required

Perfect for:
• Verifying cherry-picked changes
• Comparing similar PRs across different branches
• Catching unexpected differences in related merge requests

No sign-up required. No data collection or analytics.
